## Feature Summary
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement
Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.
Example: "I'm always frustrated when..."

## Proposed Solution
Describe the solution you'd like to see implemented.

## Alternative Solutions
Have you considered any alternative solutions or features? Please describe them.

## Use Case
Describe how this feature would be used in a real-world scenario.

Example:
"As a tattoo artist, I would like to [do something] so that I can [achieve goal]"

## User Stories
If applicable, provide user stories:
- As a [user type], I want [feature] so that [benefit]
- As a [user type], I want [feature] so that [benefit]

## Mockups / Examples
If applicable, add mockups, sketches, or examples from other apps that illustrate your idea.
You can drag and drop images here.

## Expected Behavior
Describe how the feature should work in detail.

## Impact on Existing Features
- Will this feature affect any existing functionality?
- Are there any breaking changes?
- Does this require data migration?

## Technical Considerations
If you have technical knowledge, describe:
- Required changes to data structure (LocalStorage)
- UI/UX changes needed
- PWA/offline considerations
- Browser compatibility concerns

## Priority
How important is this feature to you?
- [ ] Critical - Blocking my workflow
- [ ] High - Would significantly improve my experience
- [ ] Medium - Nice to have
- [ ] Low - Just an idea

Add any other context, screenshots, or information about the feature request here.
